transcription: I crossed the parlor towards the open archway and stopped. I was being watched. The only way to conquer my problem was to march up those stairs, walk into Tony's room, and stare straight into the eyes of that spooky portrait. If there really was a ghost, my bravado would prove to her that I was no easy scare. I reached the final top step.  and faced the hallway. Every door was shut tight. Every door except Tony's. Granny Edith Nickerson's portrait moved straight ahead on the wall in which she hung like a displayed execution.  you
